short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to save job posts from Linkedin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is not made by LinkedIn!
This Extension main functionality is to save job posts on your computer from LinkedIn.

Are you tired of applying to 100s of jobs and forget if you already applied?
The worst case is to follow a website which you don't remember credentials, go through a series of steps to retrieve your password only to find out you already applied.

The easiest solution this extension provides.
Simply click the padlock to save the current job post and you can even access it later from the extension view..  
Features included:
* A simple view with all the job posts
* Open in new tab a specific job post
* Delete a specific job 

If you want to contribute to the extension please follow up: https://github.com/Hmarkov/Linkedin-SaveJobsChromeExtension
